profile.name: hi, i'm preyanshu
bio: building crypto infrastructure ,shipping products that matter.

projects.title: wysiwyg schema builder
projects.description: a wysiwyg schema builder integrated with the schema-parser backend. it dynamically generates ui schemas from json schemas and merges them with preexisting ui schemas for seamless editing. optimized for large json handling with debouncing, batching, and in-memory caching. features include lazy loading of nested structures, url-embedded folder navigation, and schema loading from files or apis. built to simplify schema-driven app development while keeping iteration fast and scalable.

projects.title: on-chain vfs explorer
projects.description: an on-chain virtual file system explorer for fast navigation through decentralized storage. it supports in-memory caching for instant access, lazy loading of nested folders, full keyboard navigation, and the ability to open predefined paths directly. designed to handle large directory structures efficiently while keeping the interface minimal and responsive.

projects.title: rust-based solana defi liquidation detector
projects.description: rust-based liquidation indexer for drift protocol on solana using yellowstone grpc. supports real-time liquidation detection, webhook alerts with configurable severity, and postgres integration for persistent indexing. built with focus on reliability, scalability, and extensibility for defi risk monitoring.

projects.title: datasculpt - decentralized ai dataset platform
projects.description: decentralized platform on aptos for generating high-integrity ai datasets, where users design task frameworks, contributors are autonomously compensated, and a reputation layer enforces reliability and accuracy. supports csv dataset uploads, automated payouts, and real-time dashboards for both creators and workers. built to promote privacy, fairness, and transparency in collaborative data generation.

projects.title: clean react block explorer component
projects.description: built a highly performant block explorer react component with server-side rendering and incremental static regeneration. supports real-time block indexing, in-memory caching, lazy loading, and paginated block/transaction views. optimized for speed, scalability, and seo while providing a clean, functional ui

projects.title: paythree – payroll & esops for web3
projects.description: payroll and esop management platform on morph evm, enabling batch payouts, automated vesting, and on-chain transparency. it streamlines payroll with employee portals, instant notifications, and borderless, bank-free settlements while leveraging morph’s low-fee infrastructure. supports hr portal, employee portal, and organization-specific smart contracts for secure and scalable payroll operations.

projects.title: vincent ai – universal blockchain intelligence agent for the sei ecosystem
projects.description: blockchain intelligence agent for the sei ecosystem, enabling real-time wallet analysis, memecoin research, automated monitoring, and safe transactions with ai-powered insights. integrates 50+ tools natively for sei to provide multi-source intelligence fusion, persistent ai research, smart transaction execution, and advanced monitoring jobs with logs and optimization.

projects.title: chainpay – peer-to-peer crypto payment platform
projects.description: chainpay is a truly peer-to-peer crypto payment platform for freelancers, businesses, and developers. it eliminates intermediaries by enabling direct on-chain transactions, offering full ownership, instant settlement, and complete transparency. supports branded payment links, auto-generated invoices, automated reminders, multiple tokens, real-time on-chain detection, and webhook-based custom automation.

projects.title: enhanced key management system (kms)
projects.description: a browser-based key management system that enhances security and usability by encrypting private keys with aes, generating elliptic curve key pairs, and securely storing them in indexeddb. features include password-protected key retrieval, toggling key status, secure deletion, message signing, and real-time indexeddb management, ensuring strong encryption, sandboxed storage, and csp-compliant operations.

projects.title: decentralizedgameforge
projects.description: a decentralized platform empowering developers and communities to collaboratively create, fund, and govern blockchain-based games. features include decentralized game creation, proposal mechanism with on-chain voting, crowdfunding integration, transparent governance, and scalable secure architecture. the platform introduces a token economy, premium governance tools, and future goals such as nft marketplace and ai-powered proposals.

projects.title: trophymint
projects.description: a social-media integrated nft reward platform built on solana, enabling users to mint rare achievement-based nfts with limited supply. features include wallet connection, personalized dashboards with leaderboards, profile-linked nft achievements, supply tracking, and exclusive rewards. built with react + vite frontend, dscvr sdk/api integration, metaplex core standard for nft minting, and rust-based anchor smart contracts for secure and scalable operations.

projects.title: pyramid fund
projects.description: a web3-powered referral-based crowdfunding platform that creates a pyramid of faith, allowing users to launch campaigns, contribute with referral links, and earn multi-level rewards. features include campaign creation, referral-based contributions, automated reward distribution, fund withdrawal, exponential network growth, and transparent blockchain-based transactions. built with react frontend, xion testnet smart contracts, and account-abstraction for gasless contributions.

projects.title: campaign governance platform
projects.description: a decentralized campaign management platform built on solana, enabling users to create one campaign per wallet, manage donations, and securely withdraw funds. features include single-campaign restriction per wallet, transparent on-chain donation tracking, fund withdrawal, and alignment with solana governance standards. built with react + vite frontend and anchor-based solana smart contracts for secure, scalable, and decentralized operations.

projects.title: rhythmmural
projects.description: a decentralized, community-driven music contest telegram mini-app where users create daily theme-based tracks, vote on favorites, and earn rewards. features include ai-powered music generation, community voting, nft minting for winning tracks, automated reward distribution, and transparent on-chain engagement. rewards are shared by both creators and voters, with winning tracks forming part of a permanent, community-curated musical mural. built with react + next frontend, solidity smart contracts, and ethers/web3 integration.

projects.title: motion amplification vibration monitoring system
projects.description: a vibration monitoring system that leverages eulerian and phase-based video magnification algorithms to detect subtle human and machine vibrations. features include real-time health monitoring (heart rate, respiratory rate), machinery diagnostics (engine defect detection), and motion magnification visualization. built with react frontend, flask/python for magnification and ml models, and node.js api servers for orchestration. designed for universal device compatibility across web, windows, and android.

items.title: how cex deposit/withdrawal infrastructure actually works
items.description: ever wondered what happens when you deposit or withdraw from a centralized exchange (cex)? deep dive into deposit wallets, indexers, hot/cold wallets, and the complete withdrawal flow.

items.title: smart contracts on ethereum are immutable - so how do upgradeable contracts exist?
items.description: thread exploring the paradox of immutable smart contracts and how upgradeable contracts actually work in the evm ecosystem.

items.title: why do people still say mongodb doesn't scale? like... bro. ever heard of sharding?
items.description: thread debunking the myth that mongodb doesn't scale, highlighting sharding and other scaling solutions that make it enterprise-ready.

items.title: why verifying payments on evm is surprisingly hard
items.description: building a web3 payment gateway revealed the deeper challenge: proving a payment happened is easy, but proving why it happened is surprisingly hard. deep dive into evm payment verification complexities.

items.title: contributor
items.description: involved in building core protocol apps, working across stack on schema builders and on-chain data tools with focus on scalable design and smooth ux.

items.title: analyst
items.description: drove automation across hrbb ci/cd pipelines, built playwright suites in c#, and streamlined deployments with devops. offered ppo for performance.

items.title: developer
items.description: shifted core apps to next.js, optimized state management, and deployed resilient systems with aws lambda and dynamodb.

items.name: sudhanshu

items.message: working with preyanshu was a smooth experience. he's proactive, asks the right questions, and always finds a way to get things done efficiently
